text:
I report it ,but  I don't know whether it is a bug?
I just now update jakarta-tomcat4.0.4 to jakarta-tomcat-4.1.10
The jsp i wrote ago work abnormaly.it work normaly on jakarta-tomcat-4.0.4.
it said that:
Generated servlet error:
    [javac] Compiling 1 source file
/usr/local/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.10/work/Standalone/localhost/_/ls2_jsp.java:8: 
package isotogb2312 does not exist
import isotogb2312.*;
but I have already put the isotogb2312.classes into /WEB-INF/classes/
creator: mperson@10mail.net
